title: If the residential buildings/chawls are situated on a reserved parcel of land, then land component o
clause_text: If the residential buildings/chawls are situated on a reserved parcel of land, then land component of the chawl shall be developed as per the provisions of clause (7) of this Regulation without considering the reservation & remaining reserved land shall be developed as per the provisions laid down under Regulation No 17.
